summary: Completed comprehensive testing of QSP Compliance Checker. Backend APIs 90.9% functional (10/11 tests passed), frontend 100% functional. Core features working: document upload, AI clause mapping, compliance gap analysis, dashboard metrics. System successfully processed 2 QSP documents, generated 23 AI mappings, identified 11 compliance gaps with 100% compliance score.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns HTTP 500 instead of 400 for invalid file types (.pdf)
minor_bugs.impact: Error handling works but wrong status code
minor_bugs.details: Error message is correct but should return 400 Bad Request instead of 500 Internal Server Error

passed_tests: Dashboard Data Retrieval (100% compliance, 2 docs, 11 gaps, 23 mappings)
ISO Summary Upload (detected 2 new, 5 modified clauses)
AI Clause Mapping Analysis (23 mappings generated)
Get Compliance Gaps Endpoint (11 gaps retrieved)
Get Clause Mappings Endpoint (23 mappings retrieved)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix minor HTTP status code issue in /api/documents/upload endpoint - should return 400 instead of 500 for invalid file types. This is a low priority fix as functionality works correctly.
